title: Is Garen seriously the tankiest champion in the game?
body: I remember when {{champion:14}} or {{champion:113}}  where considered the tankiest champions in the game. But they have been hit a ton with the nerf bat, with nerfs to their kits making them not even tanky and nerfs to every possible tank item. Tanks feel like a joke when Garen, Skarner and Darius are ahead. They can just chunk the tanks health while taking no damage at all. Garen is just ridiculous. Opressive against melee champions with his Silence all you can do is right click away because you are going to take his combo anyway. All of his free armor and mr just allows him to buy {{item:3748}} {{item:3071}} {{item:3053}}  and be unkillable. Rest in pepperonis tanks because Juggernauts beat them not only by soaking more damage but dealing insane amounts of damage. Tanks have been massively over nerfed, I seriously don't know what to say if these armor nerfs stay. Assassins and Juggernauts are the only things being played with of course a Sated jungler.

Juggernauts can't absorb more damage than a tank, and if they can it's because they need to in order to get to their targets while still having enough life to do deal damage.

If Garen, Darius, Skarner, Mordekaiser, Nasus, Olaf, and all of these other juggernauts can't reach their targets, they do nothing, but they are really good if they can reach their targets. They compensate for it by not having mobility, and therefore being easy to kite. 

Tanks, on the other hand, either don't need to reach their targets because they have other ways of having an impact, such as Braum tanking for his carries or Blitzcrank hooking his enemies (preferably their squishies, as hooking the enemy Garen into your team is highly inadvisable) into his team, or they have enough mobility to make their tankiness useful.

And it's not like Tanks were nerfed that hard. Dead Man's Plate is amazing, Randuin's Omen and Frozen Heart are still good, magic resistance items and Warmog's Armor got buffed, and many champions got compensation for losing armor out of their core items, leaving some in a roughly similar place as before except for the fact that they aren't so reliant on specific items.

People need to stop acting like 500+ movespeed "can't reach their targets" so "they do nothing." They will nearly always reach a target. They might be delayed by cc, but they will almost certainly survive the cc and still have plenty of time to take out one or more enemies. 

When Garen is beating Janna in a footrace, it's time to put away the delusion that these guys can be reliably kited for more than a few seconds.

It is true that if a juggernaut can't reach his target that he does nothing.

What is not true is that 500+ movement speed means that the champion will reach its target. For that, the champion has to deal with enemy CC, including slows, and whatever mobility the enemy team has, and then maybe the champion will reach the target, but if he doesn't you can guarantee that the champion will not do anything.
